overall_recommendation.reason: While lacking a Metacritic score, the historical significance of Final Fantasy VII (Disc 2) as a component of a landmark game, its likely presence on a curated list, and its importance to the PlayStation's game library outweigh the absence of individual review scores or modifications.  Its inclusion ensures the completeness of the already present Final Fantasy VII entry.

While lacking an individual Metacritic score, the historical significance of Final Fantasy VII, the likelihood of its inclusion on a curated list (given the inclusion of the full game and Disc 2), and its importance to the PlayStation's game library outweigh the absence of a standalone score.  The inclusion of Disc 3 is essential for a complete representation of this landmark title.
